TopicTitle: KSP Freezes on the loading screen

Articles.Content: Please look in the "[Stock Support](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide)" sticky thread in this sub-forum for details of how to find and upload your player.log file.
Hi Oryip, will kSP work if you start the KSP.x86 or KSP.x86\_64 in the game folder directly?

If I run KSP.x86\_64 nothing happens

If I run KSP.x86 it runs the game but gets stuck at the exact same spot on the loading screen.

Please try starting KSP from the terminal with "LC\_ALL=C ./KSP.x86"

Make sure you are in the KSP directory, it's easiest to open the terminal within the KSP game folder.

I tried doing the in the terminal and got

"bash: warning: setlocale: LC\_ALL: cannot change locale (C./KSP.x86)"

Did you miss the space?

Copy the following line and paste it into your terminal.

LC\_ALL=C ./KSP.x86

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-19T18:09:35Z" title="07/19/2015 06:09  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 19, 2015</time> by sal\_vager**

You were correct, I was missing the space.

Now I'm getting

"bash: ./KSP.x86: No such file or directory"
You must be in the wrong directory, you need to be in the main game directory.

Yeah it should say something like "Oryip@computer:~/Path/To/Kerbal$" in your terminal, if you opened the terminal from the menu it'll say "Oryip@computer:~$"

Use the [**cd command**](http://www.linfo.org/cd.html) to change directory.

You were both correct, I forgot to go the the correct directory the second time.

Running the correct command in the correct directory yielded this in the command terminal.

[luke@Luke:~/.local](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#bb9e8cf9d4cbcfd2d4d59e8cff)/share/Steam/SteamApps/common/Kerbal Space Program$ LC\_ALL=C ./KSP.x86Set current directory to /home/luke/.local/share/Steam/SteamApps/common/Kerbal Space Program

It also opened KSP. It still froze but this time on "Squad/Sound/editorLoop01"

Interestingly the title of the window is "Kerbal Space ro ram" It's obviously just missing a few letters. It's also missing letters in the bar that shows all my windows, where it's titled "Kerbal ace rogram" Not sure if this is a related issue or just some small glitch.
It sounds like a bad download to be honest, I'd try a new one.
